crc.h File Reference
IP » CRC

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include "ti/csl/cslr_crc.h"

#define CRC_CHANNEL_IRQSTATUS_RAW_MAIN_ALL
 Macro defines mask for all the interrupts for a channel. More...
 
#define CRC_PATTERN_COUNT_MAX   (0x000FFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of CRC Pattern Count.
 
#define CRC_SECTOR_COUNT_MAX   (0x0000FFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of CRC Sector Count.
 
#define CRC_BCTOPLD_MAX   (0x00FFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of CRC Block Complete Timeout Counter Preload.
 
#define CRC_WDTOPLD_MAX   (0x00FFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of CRC Watchdog Timeout Counter Preload.

enum  crcIntrPriority {
  CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH1_COMPRESSION_DONE = 0x9U, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH2_COMPRESSION_DONE = 0xaU, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH3_COMPRESSION_DONE = 0xbU, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH4_COMPRESSION_DONE = 0xcU,
  CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH1_OVERRUN = 0x11U, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH2_OVERRUN = 0x12U, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH3_OVERRUN = 0x13U, CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH4_OVERRUN = 0x14U,

}

Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros.
